name: Deliverer (Double Dash)
description:
Note: Unfotunately, we couldn't get the Sprites for the collectable items done in time, so they're symbolised through these bright green blobs. I am really sorry for the inconvinience!

Story

There's a worldwide pandemic going arround, your whole city is in lockdown, nobody is supposed to go outside. Across the street, there's an old storehouse, where all the things that couldn't be delivered are stored. The people in your appartment need those things, sometimes to survive, sometimes just to get rid of their boredom. And you are immune to the virus, which means you are allowed to got outside. Enter the warehouse, find the various things that people need, and grow stronger and more capable with each delivery.

Controls:                                                                                                                                  

Note: You'll unlock more abilities as you progress, so many moves described here won't work immediately. 

Movement: "A" and "D"

Jump: "Spacebar"

Doublejump: Guess

Push and Pull Chests: "Q" + the movement keys when near a chest

Crouch: "S"

Walljump: Jump when you touch a wall and don't touch the ground

Dash: "LShift"

Respawn: "R"

Exit Level: "Enter"/"Return"

Quit Game: "Escape"

We hope you will have fun with this game!
